The Two Payment plugin for Magento simplifies B2B shopping, making it easy and safe for merchants to offer invoices as a payment method.
The payment method lives next to other payment methods in your existing checkout, and offers a variety of configuration options to suit your businesses needs.
If you would like to know more about how to configure the plugin, check out our step by step guide at %1

Two sin plugin for Magento forenkler bedriftskjøp ved å gjøre det enkelt for selger å tilby faktura som betalingsmetode.
Betalingsmetoden er tilgjengelig sammen med andre betalingsmetoder i kassen, og tilbyr en rekke konfigurasjonselementer for å tilpasses dine forretningsbehov.
